Let the chain of inquiry drive the explanation forward. Write in flowing paragraphs. Do not use bullet points, numbered lists, headers, or any visual formatting structure.
modes.contrastive: Explore this by comparing and contrasting multiple perspectives or approaches. modes.dialectical: Begin by proposing a clear position on the topic. Then challenge that position with the strongest counterarguments you can find. Do not use bullet points, numbered lists, headers, or any visual formatting structure.
